Dears @Taqi Rawashdeh <mailto:Taqi.Rawashdeh@chalhoub.com>  @Sonia Makhoukh <mailto:Sonia.Makhoukh@chalhoub.com> 

 

Good morning.

 

The Goods in Transit Insurance policy for Aramex Saudi that exclusively covers domestic shipments in KSA subject to following conditions:-

 

1.	Each shipment value does not exceed SAR 3 million per truck/per conveyance,
2.	Only domestics shipments originating from within KSA,
3.	Shipment contains brand new general commodity items and electronics (no biological, precious metals, jewelry, temperature-controlled cargos, DG or other restricted commodities),
4.	Chalhoub will declare full value of each shipment to Aramex station for insurance purposes.
5.	For each claim there will be a deductible of SAR 1,873.

 

The insurance rate is 0.54% from the total value of each shipment.

 

Kindest Regards,

 

Tarek Diab

Key Account Manager – Commercial 

Aramex International – Jeddah, Saudi Arabia.

Tel +966 920027447 - Mobile: +966560638631

aramex.com
